quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.title: How to use JEI(REI)
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.subtitle: Enough Items
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_1_1: &l&bJEI(REI)&r is a shorten word of &l&aJust Enough Items(Roughly Enough Items)&r, a useful mod for searching items' information.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_1_2: You can find &l&aRecipes of item&r, &l&aHow to use items&r, and &l&aHow to get items&r with JEI.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_1_3: &l&bREI(Roughly Enough Items)&r is similar mod of JEI.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_2_3: You can search items by mod name with prefix '@'.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_3_2: Press &lShow Recipe&r key(Default is R) to show recipe of item.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_3_3: For example, this is recipe of &lOak planks&r.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_4_2: Press &lShow Uses&r key(Default is U) to show usage of item.
quest.pixelquest.guide.jeirei.page_4_3: For example, this is recipes using &lOak log&r. If you use other mods, however, recipes can be different.
_comment.quest.pixelquest.guide.rules: The rules of New World Guide
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.title: Under the rules of New World
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.subtitle: Touch of the ruler
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_1_2: The PixelQuest Guild has established some rules under the name of the new world to make Minecraft mods easy to access.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_1_3: All changes that apply on this world are applied under the name of &l&cthe rules of New World&r.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_2_3: The performance of vanilla tools was so powerful that many people forgot about the existence of &o&aTetra tools&r.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_2_4: Therefore, we recommend making more diverse tools by reducing the durability of vanilla tools.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_3_2: Ender Pearl was very powerful when it came to going to various places in the early and middle stages of the game.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_3_3: There are many different ways to travel in this world, so we recommend to use &o&amore diverse ways to travel&r by reducing max stack size of Ender Pearl.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_4_2: Some enchantments, such as mending, used to significantly increase the performance of the tool at the time of its acquisition.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_4_3: We tried to balance users by restricting some ways to get these enchantments.
quest.pixelquest.guide.rules.page_4_4: &l&nFor a list of restricted enchantments, see Server Guide No. 2.&r
desc.pixelquest.tooltip.modified: Adjusted by the rules of New World:
desc.pixelquest.tooltip.modified.not_tra: Can't find in Trading with villagers
pixelquest.research.notification_warning: Researching Table is already in progress!!
pixelquest.research.notification_no_rese: There's nothing to research. Use Research Blueprint to start research.
pixelquest.research.notification_end: Research Completed. Please receive your research results at the research table.
pixelquest.research.notification_sleep_e: Research Completed whilst you're not connected to server. Please receive your research results at the research table.
